nodes.text: The Coronet City Spaceport, also simply known as the Coronet Spaceport or Coronet Starport, was the primary spaceport of Corellia, located in the planetary capital Coronet City.
The Coronet Spaceport was the reconstituted Sith Empire's primary spaceport in the Incorporation Islands during the Battle of Corellia.

During the Galactic Civil War, Jesseb Convorr served as the Coronet Starport Master. Circa 1 ABY, Lieutenant Mack Jasper of the Corellian Security Force investigated vandalism committed in the starport by the Ragtags.

During the development of the canon 2018 film, Solo: A Star Wars Story, the writers and directors researched Wookieepedia for spaceports on Corellia, where they found the name of "Coronet Spaceport" and decided to use it for the film.
